original_text: Then they drew Jeremiah up with ropes and lifted him out of the cistern. And Jeremiah remained in the court of the guard.
korean_text: 그들이 줄로 예레미야를 구덩이에서 끌어낸지라 예레미야가 시위대 뜰에 머무니라

sentences.original_text: Then they drew Jeremiah up with ropes
and lifted him out of the cistern.
And Jeremiah remained in the court of the guard.
